subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport says she tried to talk Venus and Serena Williams into taking part in the next round of the Fed Cup, but failed. Davenport will lead the United States team when it faces Russia late next month in Moscow. She said she lobbied Venus Williams last month at a tournament in Memphis. “It didn’t work,” Davenport said, laughing. “She said that she wasn’t going.” Davenport said she received a similar response from Serena Williams this week. Ashley Harkleroad is expected to play singles with Davenport.
